requirements: Open to nondepartmental and non-School of Drama students with prior permission of the instructor.
description:
This course focuses on the fundamentals of commercial producing on Broadway. Among the topics to be covered: why produce commercially; who produces; Broadway and Off-Broadway; the relationships between commercial producers and nonprofits; and ethical issues in a commercial setting. Practical matters covered include optioning and developing work, raising money, creating budgets, and utilizing marketing/press/advertising to attract an audience.
Open to nondepartmental and non-School of Drama students with prior permission of the instructor.
